main.c File Reference

Detailed Description

W5300 example applications

This file shows how to use WIZnet SOCKET APIs and how to implement your internet application with W5300.

Author:
MidnightCow
Date:
11/25/2008

The Main() includes the example program of W5300 such as

  • loopback_tcps()
  • loopback_tcpc()
  • loopback_udp()

Function Documentation

void loopback_tcpc ( SOCKET  s,
uint8 *  addr,
uint16  port,
uint8 *  buf,
uint16  mode 
)

"TCP CLIENT" loopback program.

It initilizes SOCKET as TCP mode and try to connect to AX1. If a connection is accepted by AX1, it receives data from AX1 and sends the data to AX1.

Parameters:
[in] s SOCKET number. It is valid when 0 <= s <= MAX_SOCK_NUM - 1.
[in] addr IP address of the PC that runs AX1 ("TCP SERVER" IP address)
[in] port listen port number of AX1 ("TCP SERVER" listen port number)
[in,out] buf A buffer to be used for loopback data
[in] mode SOCKET options
The below image shows the flow diagram of "TCP CLIENT".

<The flow of TCP CLIENT>

void loopback_tcps ( SOCKET  s,
uint16  port,
uint8 *  buf,
uint16  mode 
)

"TCP SERVER" loopback program.

It initilizes SOCKET as TCP mode and listens to a connection request of AX1. If a connection is accepted, it receives data from AX1 and sends the data to AX1.

Parameters:
[in] s SOCKET number. It is valid when 0 <= s <= MAX_SOCK_NUM - 1.
[in] port listen port number
[in,out] buf A buffer to be used for loopback data
[in] mode SOCKET options
The below image shows the flow diagram of "TCP SERVER".

<The flow of TCP SERVER>

Referenced by Main().

void loopback_udp ( SOCKET  s,
uint16  port,
uint8 *  buf,
uint16  mode 
)

UDP loopback program.

It initilizes SOCKET as UDP mode. If it receives data from any AX1, it sends the data to the AX1.

Parameters:
[in] s SOCKET number. It is valid when 0 <= s <= MAX_SOCK_NUM - 1.
[in] port listen port number
[in,out] buf A buffer to be used for loopback data
[in] mode SOCKET options
The below image shows the flow diagram of UDP or IPRAW.

<The flow of UDP or IPRAW>

Referenced by Main().

void Main (  ) 

It executes example program such as loopback_tcps(), loopback_tcpc(), and loopback_udp().

It initilizes MCU, serial port and W5300 and executes 6 loopback_tcps() which have same listen port number, 1 loopback_tcpc(), and 1 loopback_udp().
